meta.title: Juned Khan - Frontend Engineer
meta.description: Professional portfolio of Juned Khan, Frontend Engineer

personal.name: Juned Khan
personal.title: Frontend Engineer
personal.summary: Frontend-focused full-stack engineer with 4.5+ years of experience building scalable web and mobile apps in domains such as Blockchain, E-commerce, Fantasy Sports and Content Streaming.

sections.title: Summary
sections.content: Frontend-focused full-stack engineer with 4.5+ years of experience building scalable web and mobile apps in domains such as Blockchain, E-commerce, Fantasy Sports and Content Streaming.

details.text: Introduced NPM Madge script to identify all aliased import statements with circular dependencies throughout the monorepositories.
Optimized the SSR performance by refactoring mounting logic of multiple screens.

Responsible for maintaining 12 e-commerce stores of major IPL teams scaled from a single codebase ensuring extremely high re-usability and extending Figma scripts to maintain dynamic global color palette for brand specific themes.
Engineered dynamic sitemaps updated daily via CRON jobs, reflecting real-time stock inventory and significantly improving SEO and product discoverability.

Delivered end-to-end features like Ratings & Review System, Smart filters, Collateral Payments with Dream11 Rewards which contributed significant increase of 10.5% in user-acquisition & 15.6% in user-engagement.
Led comprehensive PR reviews across shared frontend repositories and participated in hiring loops by evaluating technical assignments and conducting interviews.
Worked on POC to leverage AI for UI development using a well-defined design system and components library to reduce the deliverables turn-around time.
Led development of KPMG's decentralized identity and verifiable credentials platform from scratch, enabling secure access for 250K+ employees.
Reverse-engineered Hashlips engine to generate 10K+ unique NFTs from layered assets for a live Ethereum collection.
Architected the frontend of Kryptoria, an Ethereum-based metaverse game, with MetaMask wallet login, seamless minting, and low-gas on-chain gameplay.
Built and optimized Solster, a Solana-based DeFi platform handling 30+ fundraising campaigns with complex on-chain flows, staking, and lottery systems.
Received Best Debutant Award in recognition of my rapid technical growth leading to a promotion for Senior role
Developed Godi Energy's website, which led to successful funding and played a full-stack role in implementing major data-intensive components of dashboard for a battery monitoring system.
Studied Operating Systems; Databases; Discrete Mathematics; Algorithms; Microprocessors; Computer Networks; Computer Graphics; Engineering Mathematics; etc.

items.title: NLP driven Assignments Evaluation
items.content: Implemented NLP-driven answer validation system using cosine similarity algorithm on search-scraped data, with features like question bank generation and assignment CRUD operations.

fonts.primary: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, 'Helvetica Neue', Arial, sans-serif
